summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3086, for the improvement of Roy Street, from the westerly margin of Second Avenue North to Westlake Avenue North all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37481 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
